page.title: 07THE SPORTING LIFE
page.content: Bellahouston Park provides most of the{recreation}in this area; there are lovely gardens to be enjoyed, and for people who like to jog there are marked routes through and around the park. There is a 400 m running track, a dry ski_slope for people wishing to learn or to practice to ski and a pitch and putt green for less energenic people. Bowling and tennis are also available. There is a Sports Centre where badminton, squash, judo, kendo and karate are practised there. The handicapped are given every help to take part in sports catered for e.g. basketball. Within the centre there are lockers, showers and a cafe.
